isUpValid

public static boolean isUpValid(Vec3D up)
Check orientation consistency Returns true if the given vector complies with the up specs. It should have only two zeros and one 1 or -1

up - - Vec3D vector

boolean

timeBox

public static void timeBox(Gml gml,
                           float duration,
                           boolean keepRatio)
Makes the Gml fit into a certain duration.
If the keepRatio parameter is true or if the original duration is zero, then time is split accross all layers, strokes and points.
If not forced and if the original duration is not zero, then the time is mapped by keeping the original interval ratio between each point.

Parameters:
gml - - Gml
duration - - float
keepRatio - - boolean
